Title: ↩️ 🇮🇷🇮🇱 - Opinion of Admin: Iran (and the larger Axis of Resi...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇱🇧🇮🇱⚡️- Israeli airstrike in Tyre (Sur) Lebanon, in an apparent assassination attempt on an unknown Hezbollah official. 🇮🇷🇮🇱 - Opinion of Admin: Iran (and the larger Axis of Resistance) is very quickly losing its window of opportunity to strike Israel, and it’s risking Iran no longer having any kind of established deterrence. Israel is - quite frankly - raping the AoR and its member parties with impunity.If Iran doesn’t react soon, and if its reaction isn’t one that inflicts great damage against Israel, Iran is no longer a credible threat against Israel. The security balance is falling apart, and the checks that Iran and Israel once had against each other is vanishing due to Iran’s inaction.

Russian forces have also captured 8 Ukrainian fortifications and established… 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Russian forces continue to advance greatly in the Pokrovsk direction.In the past 24 hours Russian forces have captured 23.8 sqkm in just the Pokrovsk sector – confirmed by Ukrainian sources.The recent advance saw Russian troops capture all three of Sergeevka's fortifications. Russian forces also advanced along the Progres railway, reaching the outskirts of Nikolaivka and Orlovka.

Russian sources… 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Russian forces have reached the outskirts of Liptsy (northern-Kharkov direction).After several weeks of Ukrainian counter-offensives in Glubokoe, Russia has managed to not only regain lost territory but once again reach the northern tip of Liptsy.Russian troops were seen storming Ukrainian positions at 50.25438, 36.40176, marked on the map.
